english_example_sentence: I would have thought about this complex project more carefully yesterday.
russian_example_sentence: Я бы подумал об этом сложном проекте более внимательно вчера.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben dün bu karmaşık projeyi daha dikkatli düşünecektim.
